input.sentences: we arrived at the wedding right on time .
we walked up and they were just coming down the aisle .
they said there vows and it was official .
they left on their honeymoon and everyone went home .
output.sentences: The wedding day was finally here and everyone was quite excited.
The walk down the aisle made for a magical vision.
The exchange of vows was a moving expression of unity.
Everyone celebrated, cheered and exalted in the couple's happiness.
The newlyweds were more exicted than they'd ever been.
